sn11.5:4.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:4.4: ‘*hotu, devānaminda, subhāsitena jayo’ti.
sn11.5:4.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devā ca asurā ca pārisajje ṭhapesuṃ:
sn11.5:4.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:4.10: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:4.13: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:6.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:6.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:6.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:8.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāya, devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:8.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:8.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:10.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:10.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:10.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn11.5:17.1: Bhāsitāsu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāsu, devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:17.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devānañca asurānañca pārisajjā etadavocuṃ:
sn11.5:17.4: Tā ca kho sadaṇḍāvacarā sasatthāvacarā, iti bhaṇḍanaṃ iti viggaho iti kalaho.
sn11.5:17.5: Bhāsitā kho sakkena devānamindena gāthāyo.
sn11.5:17.6: Tā ca kho adaṇḍāvacarā asatthāvacarā, iti abhaṇḍanaṃ iti aviggaho iti akalaho.
sn11.5:17.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devānamindassa subhāsitena jayo ahosī”ti.
